org.radarcns.management.domain.support

Class LogPublisherEntityListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radarcns.management.domain.support.LogPublisherEntityListener

  • @Component
public class LogPublisherEntityListener
extends java.lang.Object
    Entity listener that publishes entity events to log, to have a uniform, centralized logging of entity operations.
